timeline.message: [fr] adjusted rules, added words to the dictionnary

timeline.bodyText: I don't know if "ya" is a common misspelling. If it is, I suggest writing different XML rules with the appropriate replacement. For example, for il n'ya the only suggestion should be il n'y a, etc.
timeline.author: jaumeortola
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -5,13 +5,13 @@
 # Both 'phrase' and 'replacement' can contain more than one value when separated by '|'.
 # Example:
 # incorrect=suggestion one|suggestion two
-ya=y a
+jai=j'ai
+ya=y'a|y a|il y a
